'''Ei''' is a quest-exclusive enemy encountered during the following quests:
{{Quest|Amidst Stormy Judgment;The Omnipresent God|display=bullet}}

During ''[[Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow]]'', the boss' displayed name is "Raiden Shogun" and her title is ''The Seven: Electro Archon''.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|electro_res  = Immune

|hp_ratio  = 40
|hp_type   = 2
|atk_ratio = 9
}}

==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''

===Phase 1===
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Ei

|name_1 = Slash Combo 1
|desc_1 = Performs 3 slashes with her [[Engulfing Lightning|polearm]], dealing '''25% ATK''', '''25% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. This attack is always used when Ei teleports to the player's left side.
* If the player is close to Ei after the first 3 slashes, performs 3 more slashes, dealing '''16.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} with each slash. Ei dashes forward with the final slash and releases a flurry of slashes behind her, dealing '''12.5% ATK''', '''12.5% ATK''', '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
* If the player is far from Ei after the first 3 slashes, follows up with '''Lightning Blade'''.

|name_2 = Slash Combo 2
|desc_2 = Spins her polearm before dashing at the player and performing 4 consecutive strikes, dealing '''16.6% ATK''', '''25% ATK''', '''25% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_3 = Lightning Summon
|desc_3 = Spins her polearm and summons lightning in a large area around her, dealing '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. This attack cannot be dodged using [[Sprinting#Dash|dash]] [[Invincibility Frames|i-frames]]. This attack is always used when Ei teleports to the player's right side.

|name_4 = Lightning Blade
|desc_4 = Launches a fast vertical blade at the player, dealing '''33.3% ATK''' if the blade hits the player or '''33.3% ATK x 2''' if the blade and the Polearm hits the player as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. This attack is often used as a follow-up to '''Slash Combo 1''' but can also be used individually.

|name_5 = Magatsu Electroculi
|desc_5 = Summons three Magatsu Electroculi around the arena while [[Vacuum Field|pushing]] nearby players away from her, dealing '''16.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. Each Electroculus marks a large area around itself and charges. If not destroyed after a period of time, the Magatsu Electroculi explode violently, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}} depending on where the player stands in the marked areas:
* In a single area: '''133.3% ATK'''
* In 2 overlapping areas: '''33.3% ATK x 2'''
* In 3 overlapping areas: '''13.3% ATK x 3'''

|name_6 = Follow-Up
|desc_6 = If the player is behind Ei shortly after she performs a '''Slash Combo''', swiftly turns around to perform a slash. Explosions will also occur on the ground along the slash's path. The slash and the explosion each deals '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_7 = Vision Hunt Decree
|desc_7 = Deals '''16.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} and locks all characters' [[Elemental Skill]]s and [[Elemental Burst]]s, except for the [[Traveler]]'s.
}}

Some time after the cast of '''Vison Hunt Decree''' during ''The Omnipresent God'', Ei will teleport to the center of the arena and start a cutscene, once this ends she will replace her polearm with the [[Musou Isshin]] and start phase 2.

===Phase 2===
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Ei

|name_1 = Slash Combo 3
|desc_1 = Performs three consecutive slashes in a horizontal quickdraw, spin slash, and downward slam with her blade, dealing '''33.3% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK ×2''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
*If the player is close to Ei after the first 3 slashes, attacks while dashing forward and withdrawing, dealing '''33.3% ATK + 16.6% ATK''', and '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
*If the player is far from Ei after the first 3 slashes, follows up with '''Eyes of Stillness'''.

|name_2 = Slash Combo 4
|desc_2 = Performs a circular slash and quickly repositions behind the player to perform another slash, dealing '''16.6% ATK ×2''', '''16.6% ATK''', '''58.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_3 = Slash Combo 5
|desc_3 = Performs three consecutive slashes around her, dealing '''16.6% ATK''', '''16.6% ATK''', '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_4 = Iai: Cross-Slash
|desc_4 = Dashes towards the player and slashes twice in a cross pattern, dealing '''8.3% ATK''', '''8.3% ATK''', '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_5 = Unbending Lightning
|desc_5 = Launches three discs followed by a horizontal blade at the player, dealing '''33.3% ATK ×3''', '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on contact.

|name_6 = Eyes of Stillness
|desc_6 = Summons up to 3 eyes that unleash a flurry of slashes shortly after appearing, each dealing '''5.6% ATK ×4''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_7 = Musou no Hitotachi
|desc_7 = Ei [[Vacuum Field|pushes]] nearby players away from her, while Electro seeds descend around the arena, each dealing '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on landing and creating a field that deals '''12.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DoT}}. Ei then unleashes a flurry of slashes that temporarily freezes players in place within its AoE, dealing '''33.3% ATK ×4''', '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_8 = Follow-Up
|desc_8 = If the player is behind Ei shortly after she performs certain attacks, swiftly turns around to perform a flurry of slashes, dealing '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
}}

==Trivia==
* While the Vision Hunt Decree is active, even characters who do not use visions to channel their powers are unable to cast their Elemental Skills and Bursts, with the Traveler as the sole exception. Meanwhile, [[catalyst]] and [[bow]] users can still channel the elements via their [[Normal Attack]]s.
